700480f-a.text:
Baychester Avenue, at the S.E. corner of Boston Road.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
700480f-a.folder: Baychester Avenue & Boston Road, Bronx, NY

700554f-a.text:
Boston Road, south side (vantage point), between Baychester and De Reimer Avenues. The view is south across cultivated land and the
New York, Westchester and Boston Railroad.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
